title: Courage
desc:
Post 755
- You can give up to 5 other cards when you play this.
- When giving the 5 extra cards, you will be forced to stop if your hand hits 3 cards.
- If you hold this, 753, and 754 in your hand, it will be announced and you will win the game in three turns.
- Only one of these cards will be present in the draw pile, if at all.
